column5: i hear u, i love u. you’re not alone in these thoughts. u are so worthy of love and a life worth living!!! ❤️

yes omg!!! been catching myself slowly unraveling... withholding feelings, lying, spending money on silly stuff, stealing, driving all night, stalking... it’s not enough to feed manic bpd hunger. luckily dbt skills have been a huge factor in deescalating the directly harmful behaviors, but like the urge is still there lol. building a life worth living is no joke ;-;
